ValidationRule.description: "Owning Faculty" is required to mark as complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Activity', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Short_Course', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Unit', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Module' ),
ISPICKVAL( ProductRequestID__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), AND( NOT (ISCHANGED( Design_Form_Status__c ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Sent'), ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Received') ) ), ISBLANK( Owning_Faculty__c ), Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c = true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Owning Faculty" is required to mark as complete.
